name: Sweet home (Dividebyzer0 team)
description:
The life of dung beetle is not an easy one. On its way to human farm, the little bug and its rolling house need to overcome many obstacles, such as flying predators and harsh environment. Be a kind person – help little dung beetle fulfill its dream!

Made for GGJ2019 (and a bit after) by Dividebyzer0 team & friends
